body:
So most of you have noticed that I got promoted to Jr Mod today so I decided to make an AMA.
So ask away...

EDIT: Poetry skills on point...
body_tagged:
So most of you have noticed that I got promoted to Jr Mod today so I decided to make an AMA.
So ask away...

EDIT: Poetry skills on point...
title: Jr Mod AMA

replies.body: Was it fun punishing your own brother?
replies.body_tagged: Was it fun punishing your own brother?

replies.body: He spawnkilled, his fault. Noob forgot I was still on the server. xD
replies.body_tagged: He spawnkilled, his fault. Noob forgot I was still on the server. xD

reply_to.body: Was it fun punishing your own brother?
reply_to.body_tagged: Was it fun punishing your own brother?

replies.body: How did it feel to be promoted after the interview? How does it feel to be JrMod?
replies.body_tagged: How did it feel to be promoted after the interview? How does it feel to be JrMod?

replies.body: I was excited! I felt important and special!!
replies.body_tagged: I was excited! I felt important and special!!

reply_to.body: How did it feel to be promoted after the interview? How does it feel to be JrMod?
reply_to.body_tagged: How did it feel to be promoted after the interview? How does it feel to be JrMod?

replies.body: One a scale of pie squared-28 to the 25th power, how excited were you
replies.body_tagged: One a scale of pie squared-28 to the 25th power, how excited were you

reply_to.body: I was excited! I felt important and special!!
reply_to.body_tagged: I was excited! I felt important and special!!

replies.body: Penguin is how excited I was.

Thanks!

replies.body: is jr mod a rank hard to handle?
replies.body_tagged: is jr mod a rank hard to handle?

replies.body: Tbh, It's a little frustrating to have to call a mod on EVERY time I need a ban. But other than that, it's a breeze.
replies.body_tagged: Tbh, It's a little frustrating to have to call a mod on EVERY time I need a ban. But other than that, it's a breeze.

reply_to.body: is jr mod a rank hard to handle?
reply_to.body_tagged: is jr mod a rank hard to handle?

replies.body:
I may be mistaking you for another Jr. Mod, but weren't you named "sheamus" or something once? If you are, I remember you being a generally chill guy on the forums.

Anyways, what's your favorite part about being on the staff?
Also, do you like waffles? :P
replies.body_tagged:
I may be mistaking you for another Jr. Mod, but weren't you named "sheamus" or something once? If you are, I remember you being a generally chill guy on the forums.

Anyways, what's your favorite part about being on the staff?
Also, do you like waffles? :P

replies.body:
Yes, I was sheamus.

I guess all the funny conversations xD it cracks me up.
And yes, I like waffles.
